title: Sydney breakthrough offers hope for childhood cancer | 7NEWS
description: Sydney researchers at the Children's Cancer Institute have discovered a non-toxic treatment approach for neuroblastoma, a deadly childhood cancer that develops in nerve tissue, by targeting an amino acid called arginine that cancer cells require.   The breakthrough could significantly improve survival rates without the harmful side effects of current chemotherapy treatments, which are extremely toxic and can cause secondary cancers later in life. title: Terrifying moment fireball erupts at industrial park
description: A massive explosion erupted at a factory in the Buenos Aires Province in Argentina. title: Machine gun attack rocks a Casula street
description: A gunman fired at least 40 shots from a high-powered machine gun into a home in Casula, while an accomplice filmed the attack from a getaway car. Police describe this as a targeted attack on a property under construction. The intended victim allegedly has links to organised crime. #Casulashooting #Casula #attack #shotsfiredinCasula

title: Trump urges probe of Epstein 'ties' with Bill Clinton
description: US President Donald Trump has asked the US Justice Department and the FBI to investigate links between the late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein and some high-profile Democrats, including former President Bill Clinton and former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers. #US #FBI #DonaldTrump #BillClinton #Epsteinfiles

title: Driver accused of targeting kids on e-bike
description: The driver of this ute has been accused of crashing into teens on an e-bike in Gymea Bay. It's alleged the 50-year-old drove off the road and into the bike, causing a passenger, a 14-year-old boy, to come off. #GymeaBay #ebike #ute
